sections.general:
RESEARCH MOLECULAR/RESEARCH MICROBIOLOGIST/RESEARCH ECOLOGIST (RESEARCH ASSOCIATE)
Professional Summary
Fully credentialed LPN with experience providing compassionate care in a hospital environment.
Experienced LPN licensed in AZ with strong clinical and people skills.
Core Qualifications
Wound care expertise
Problem resolution ability
Clinical training
Enthusiastic caregiver
Wound cleaning/care ability
Patient/family focused
Strong medical ethic
Practiced in sterilization techniques
Strong clinical judgment
AED certification
Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) certification
Abides by infection control standards
CPR/BLS certified
Accomplished in colostomy care
Drug administration trained
Patient positioning understanding
Talent in obtaining/charting vital signs
